plugin.name: ziggeo-core
plugin.title: Ziggeo Video Posts and Comments
plugin.author: Ziggeo
plugin.tags: video, video service, record video, video playback, gallery, ziggeo
plugin.description: This plugin allows you to bring video to your Wordpress website or blog, through use of powerful Ziggeo API. Since we all know that video is future, make sure you are part of it.
plugin.highlight: Version 3.0 has been released with lazyload support, new template processing and more
